title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8131.28 - Town of Onondaga
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8131.28 - Town of Onondaga

State Regulations
(a) Onondaga

Boulevard between Route 173 and the Wegmans Food Markets, Inc., property on

Onondaga Boulevard; provided, however, that this route is designated as an
access highway for use by tractor-semitrailer combinations with no overall
length limitations, and for vehicles 102 inches wide, and is not hereby
designated as an access highway for tandem trailer vehicles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8131.28

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
